Name: Yellow Belly
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Lemon, lemon and lemon, but well-balanced, refreshing and tasty. A great early summer's evening cocktail.
History: Originally named Yellow Belly Martini, this was a popular neo-martini in London during the 1990s.
Nutrition: One serving of Yellow Belly contains 99 calories
